adrFormatAddress: 145 Orchard St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I absolutely love this shop so much!! I don't live in NYC, and have only received items via their online shop and WOW! What an incredible company! From the packaging, to the excellent customer service that they provided me via email - I feel so taken care of. I LOVEEEEE my House of Sunny Cardigan so much!! My package arrived in excellent condition, and the packaging was so cute. The personal touch of the handwritten note too was so sweet! Some of their items are on preorder, but they were so on top of it via email letting me know that my items would arrive soon. I love how hands on this company is with their customers, and I honestly can't wait to go visit their shop once I go to NYC.

originalText.text: This shop is wonderful! I always enjoy shopping from the sweetest owners! They carry some of the most beautiful and curated brands, I am always so happy with the pieces I purchase. The packages I receive are always wrapped so nicely. Love that they offer a pre-order option to secure your purchase, I pre-ordered an Amomento coat for this winter and I am so in love. Totally worth the wait, I can’t wait to get more! Thank you for always being so wonderful and helpful!!! You have to check out this shop, you will not be disappointed! Oh and bonus they just dropped a vintage selection and it’s awesome!

originalText.text: Great experience - nice clothes, well priced.

originalText.text: I just received my Coven Séance Candle by Aquelarre Shop and am IN LOVE!  This fragrance is absolutely dreamy and I will definitely be ordering more.  The packaging was beautiful, the candle jar is beautiful, the gift box is beautiful!  It even included candle care instructions and a very thoughtful, personalized message from Aquelarre Shop.  Thank you so much!!!

text.text: I just received my Coven Séance Candle by Aquelarre Shop and am IN LOVE!  This fragrance is absolutely dreamy and I will definitely be ordering more.  The packaging was beautiful, the candle jar is beautiful, the gift box is beautiful!  It even included candle care instructions and a very thoughtful, personalized message from Aquelarre Shop.  Thank you so much!!!

originalText.text: I have purchased various items for my wife from this store the last few years. Very hard to find and special order jewelry, shoes and clothing. The customer service has always been first class and earlier than expected deliveries. Anytime I have had to return an item for a different size the new size has been sent expedited as I had asked for.  For men shopping for their wife’s or girl friends and want special items that are not available at the everyday store...shop here and you will for sure earn points :). Very quality women’s wear and the home made candles are great for the girls in the office.
